name: FlowState
signal_source: Productivity research shows employees lose 3.3 hours weekly to app switching, with 56% reporting performance impact from context switching
description: Single-session focus environment that consolidates essential work functions to eliminate context switching during deep work
target_user: Knowledge workers who struggle with productivity loss due to constant app switching and digital interruptions
pain_point_evidence: Workers toggle between apps 1,200 times daily, with 45% saying app switching makes them less productive and 43% finding it mentally exhausting
core_loop: Access consolidated tools in single interface
differentiation: Session-based focus vs. app blocking, consolidates tools rather than restricting access
subscription_fit: Premium includes team coordination, advanced integrations, and detailed focus analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free individual sessions, premium for team features and integrations
